title: Under the Shower of Autumn Leaves
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>I’m sorry to bother you while you’re in the middle of helping the shrine, Nozomi-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It’s fine, it’s fine. You’re welcome anytime. So, what did you want to talk with me about?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes, umm…. Ever since I started as a school idol, I’ve been worrying about balancing it with my external activities…. Volunteering. So I wanted to ask you for tips on how you use your time because you’ve been helping hard here, Nozomi-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Eeh!? I think you’re amazing for working so hard as a volunteer and as a school idol while being the student council president, you know, Shioriko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You also juggle being a school idol, helping here, and being Eli-san’s right hand in the student council, Nozomi-san. How do you efficiently use your time? I know it’s selfish of me, but I want to put as much effort into all of them as I can<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>….There, there<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>There’s only one thing I’ll say. Shioriko-chan, you shouldn’t overdo it. The desire to put your all into everything may tire you out little by little, Shioriko-chan. That’s why, for now, why don’t you focus only on what’s in front of you? Don’t think about everything all at once, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Nozomi-san….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>With that said, let’s put all of your efforts into watching the beautiful fallen leaves dance with me right now~. Help me clean them up later, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
